String.Source: Unfortunately, he never told me either.
String.Dest: 真不幸，他也从来没有告诉我。

String.Source: I'm sure it was beautiful. Maybe someday, I'll meet someone who knows it. And I'll know the name of the person I honor.
String.Dest: 我确定这是美好的。也许某一天，我会遇见某个知情的人，然后我就能知道这个我所尊敬之人的名字了。

String.Source: It was some Argonian garble.
String.Dest: 这是些亚龙人在断章取义。

String.Source: I'm sure it was beautiful. Maybe someday, I'll meet someone who knows it. And I'll know the name of the person I honor.
String.Dest: 我确定这是美好的。也许某一天，我会遇见某个知情的人，然后我就能知道这个我所尊敬之人的名字了。

String.Source: You wouldn't understand it.
String.Dest: 你是不会理解的。

String.Source: I'm sure it was beautiful. Maybe someday, I'll meet someone who knows it. And I'll know the name of the person I honor.
String.Dest: 我确定这是美好的。也许某一天，我会遇见某个知情的人，然后我就能知道这个我所尊敬之人的名字了。

String.Source: It was Among-the-Hist.
String.Dest: 是伊斯特之阿蒙干的！

String.Source: That's a beautiful name. I'll remember it always.
String.Dest: 这真是个美丽的名字。我会一直铭记在心的。

String.Source: You have your life back. Don't let it go to waste.
String.Dest: 你过去有你自己的生活。不要去浪费它。

String.Source: I-I know. He did for me what I didn't do for Feldas. He saved me. I owe it to him to live.
String.Dest: 我...我知道。他救了我，我却没有救芬达斯。我欠他一条命。

String.Source: You have your life back. Don't let it go to waste.
String.Dest: 你过去有你自己的生活。不要去浪费它。

String.Source: He said he hunted vampires...but he was so kind. I never even knew his name.
String.Dest: He said he hunted vampires...but he was so kind. I never even knew his name.

String.Source: It should've been you.
String.Dest: 应该就是你吧。

String.Source: I-I know. Everything has been my fault. Feldas too. But that won't change.
String.Dest: 我...我知道，这一切都是我的错。芬达斯也有错。不过这改变不了什么。

String.Source: It should've been you.
String.Dest: 应该就是你吧。

String.Source: I...I have to do my best to live. To honor the life he saved.
String.Dest: 我需要尽我所能地活下去。为了纪念这条他所拯救的生命。

String.Source: It should've been you.
String.Dest: 应该就是你吧。

String.Source: He said he hunted vampires...but he was so kind. I never even knew his name.
String.Dest: He said he hunted vampires...but he was so kind. I never even knew his name.

String.Source: I'm sorry. I didn't know this is what he planned.
String.Dest: 真对不起！我不知道他的计划是这个样子的。

String.Source: Neither did I. I would've never allowed it. It should have been me.
String.Dest: 我也没有。我绝不会允许它的。这一切应该发生在我身上。

String.Source: I'm sorry. I didn't know this is what he planned.
String.Dest: 真对不起！我不知道他的计划是这个样子的。

String.Source: But I...I have to do my best. He gave me everything...and I owe it to him to do the same.
String.Dest: 但我...我必须尽我最大的努力。他给了我一切 ...做这样的事是我欠他的。

String.Source: I'm sorry. I didn't know this is what he planned.
String.Dest: 真对不起！我不知道他的计划是这个样子的。

String.Source: He said he hunted vampires...but he was so kind. I never even knew his name.
String.Dest: He said he hunted vampires...but he was so kind. I never even knew his name.

String.Source: All we can do now is honor his wishes. I will fight, and you will live.
String.Dest: 我们所还能做的就是尊重他的意愿，我继续我的战斗，你继续你的生活。

String.Source: You're so strong. He told me I was the same. But then why do I feel so helpless?
String.Dest: 你强壮极了。他也是那样告诉我的。但为什么我会感觉这般的绝望？

String.Source: All we can do now is honor his wishes. I will fight, and you will live.
String.Dest: 我们所还能做的就是尊重他的意愿，我继续我的战斗，你继续你的生活。

String.Source: But I...I have to do my best. He gave me everything...and I owe it to him to do the same.
String.Dest: 但我...我必须尽我最大的努力。他给了我一切 ...做这样的事是我欠他的。

String.Source: All we can do now is honor his wishes. I will fight, and you will live.
String.Dest: 我们所还能做的就是尊重他的意愿，我继续我的战斗，你继续你的生活。

String.Source: He said he hunted vampires...but he was so kind. I never even knew his name.
String.Dest: He said he hunted vampires...but he was so kind. I never even knew his name.

String.Source: No...I...didn't want this...not like this...
String.Dest: 不……我……我不想这样……不是像你想的那样……

String.Source: H-he's dead...
String.Dest: 他..他死了...

String.Source: Thank you. I-I'll never forget what you've done for me.
String.Dest: Thank you. I-I'll never forget what you've done for me.

String.Source: The sun...it's so...warm.
String.Dest: 太阳...好..温暖。

String.Source: Stop the ritual! Stop it! I beg you!
String.Dest: 停下仪式吧！停下来！求你了！

String.Source: Please! Don't do this!
String.Dest: 求求你！别这样！

String.Source: No! You can't!
String.Dest: 不！你不能！

String.Source: Right...right here?
String.Dest: 就在……就在这里？

String.Source: I-I'll try. For Feldas. For mother, father. For everyone.
String.Dest: 我…我…会做的。为了芬达斯，为了我父亲、我母亲，还有为了所有人。

String.Source: I-it's you! But...I want to wait for mother and father.
String.Dest: 是……是你！但……我想等等我的父母。

String.Source: Please...I just want to be left alone!
String.Dest: 求求你...我只想自己呆一会！

String.Source: Tunnels? I-I don't understand.
String.Dest: 隧道？我……我不明白。

String.Source: I know. I told you. They came through ice...
String.Dest: 我知道。我跟你说过。他们踏着冰雪而来。

String.Source: I-It's you. You've come back.
String.Dest: 是...是你啊。你回来了。

String.Source: No...no longer with the clan. Twins...like Rinori...tell her...I'm sorry...it was my fault.
String.Dest: 不……不再有这个家族了。双胞胎……瑞诺丽……告诉她……我很抱歉……这都是我的错。

String.Source: Mara's Eye...They came from Mara's Eye...through the ice...
String.Dest: 玛拉之眼......他们穿越冰境......自玛拉之眼而来......

String.Source: How do you know the scene hasn't been tampered with?
String.Dest: 你们怎么能确保现在看到的这些没有被篡改过。

String.Source: Not many people can find the place, to be honest, since it's not on any map.
String.Dest: 说实话，没多少人能找到这个地方。因为那里在任何一份地图上都没有标示。

String.Source: How do you know the scene hasn't been tampered with?
String.Dest: 你们怎么能确保现在看到的这些没有被篡改过。

String.Source: The only reason the guard were able to arrest my father is because he was forced to spend the night in Solitude.
String.Dest: 守卫逮捕我父亲唯一可行的理由就是他非自愿而不得不在独孤城过了一夜。

String.Source: The Shrine of Azura. Her arms touch the heavens, holding the sun and the moon.
String.Dest: 阿祖拉的祭坛。她的臂膀伸入天堂。抓着太阳和月亮。

String.Source: I...I've heard of it. They say she looks east, to Morrowind, and her visions prophesied the Red Year.
String.Dest: I...I've heard of it. They say she looks east, to Morrowind, and her visions prophesied the Red Year.

String.Source: I take it you left Morrowind because the land is not fertile.
String.Dest: 我认为你离开晨风的原因是因为那里不够富饶。

String.Source: Yes. The growth has been so slow. They say Vvardenfell was once a place of many wonders. And far less sorrow.
String.Dest: Yes. The growth has been so slow. They say Vvardenfell was once a place of many wonders. And far less sorrow.

String.Source: ...but only if they stand on their toes.
String.Dest: ...但如果他们踮着脚尖。

String.Source: I'd better bring a footstool.
String.Dest: 我最好自带个脚凳。

String.Source: Do you visit the Stone Quarter often?
String.Dest: 你常去石头居住区吗?

String.Source: Just the market. Aval pities me. The meat is fresh, and never cooked.
String.Dest: Just the market. Aval pities me. The meat is fresh, and never cooked.

String.Source: It's up to you. If you are ready, a man in Morthal named Falion can help.
String.Dest: 这要看你的意愿。当你做好准备，莫萨尔村 有个叫法利昂的人可以帮你解脱。

String.Source: Thank you. I will see him, if the burden becomes too much to bear. But I still hold out hope that...that I will not go alone.
String.Dest: Thank you. I will see him, if the burden becomes too much to bear. But I still hold out hope that...that I will not go alone.

String.Source: New flora will rise from the ashfall, as it has for centuries.
String.Dest: 鲜花和嫩草会从废土死灰中长出，世世代代都是如此。

String.Source: I...I am comforted by your words. But I am saddened too. While life will return, I will never get to see the cantons of Vivec City.
String.Dest: I...I am comforted by your words. But I am saddened too. While life will return, I will never get to see the cantons of Vivec City.

String.Source: There is a cure, but you must feed first to tip the scales toward life.
String.Dest: 可以治愈，但是你必须要【看重生命的尺度。】

String.Source: So it's true. The thing I revile most is my only salvation. It seems...almost cruel.
String.Dest: So it's true. The thing I revile most is my only salvation. It seems...almost cruel.

String.Source: What comes? Out with it, girl!
String.Dest: 然后呢？快说，小姑娘！

String.Source: Vampires...so many of them I...Feldas. Poor Feldas. It was all my fault. I was supposed to watch him.
String.Dest: 吸血鬼们...一大群。我...芬达斯。可怜的芬达斯。这全是我的错。我本该看好他的。

String.Source: These are troubled times. Good people must rely on each other.
String.Dest: These are troubled times. Good people must rely on each other.

String.Source: I know, but...I don't think I'm someone you can rely on.
String.Dest: 我懂，可是……我觉得自己不是那种可靠的人吧。

String.Source: Many brave Dunmer were lost migrating to Skyrim. I'm sorry for your loss.
String.Dest: 许多勇敢的暗精灵在迁徙到天际的途中死去了，我很遗憾。

String.Source: Feldas wasn't brave. He was stupid! Always rushing in! Always...I'm sorry. You don't need to hear this.
String.Dest: Feldas wasn't brave. He was stupid! Always rushing in! Always...I'm sorry. You don't need to hear this.

String.Source: What about the docks?
String.Dest: 那码头怎么样？

String.Source: Are you...are you following me?
String.Dest: 你……你是在跟着我吗？

String.Source: What about the docks?
String.Dest: 那码头怎么样？

String.Source: Well, um, we're here aren't we?
String.Dest: Well, um, we're here aren't we?

String.Source: As opposed to the catacombs. With all its ash and dust.
String.Dest: 相对于地下墓穴。所有的灰尘。

String.Source: I like it. I mean, I like knowing that...we're all dust in the end. It comforts me.
String.Dest: I like it. I mean, I like knowing that...we're all dust in the end. It comforts me.

String.Source: As opposed to the catacombs. With all its ash and dust.
String.Dest: 相对于地下墓穴。所有的灰尘。

String.Source: It doesn't matter who you are...what you are...it all whittles away.
String.Dest: 不管你是谁，你做什么，都会随风飘去。

String.Source: As opposed to the catacombs. With all its ash and dust.
String.Dest: 相对于地下墓穴。所有的灰尘。

String.Source: It's strange. When certain...creatures are made, I've heard their insides are turned to dust. Like corpses returned to time.
String.Dest: It's strange. When certain...creatures are made, I've heard their insides are turned to dust. Like corpses returned to time.

String.Source: As opposed to the catacombs. With all its ash and dust.
String.Dest: 相对于地下墓穴。所有的灰尘。

String.Source: But...their flesh. It's ageless. As if time forgot them. And I don't know which part is unreal.
String.Dest: But...their flesh. It's ageless. As if time forgot them. And I don't know which part is unreal.

String.Source: As opposed to the catacombs. With all its ash and dust.
String.Dest: 相对于地下墓穴。所有的灰尘。

String.Source: If I told you someone I knew...was taken by a vampire, would that mean he was...alive?
String.Dest: If I told you someone I knew...was taken by a vampire, would that mean he was...alive?

String.Source: Perhaps if you slept more you wouldn't...pause...so much.
String.Dest: 也许你多睡点觉就不会……这么…卡…了。

String.Source: You can't treat people this way. Many of us have lost our homes. Our families!
String.Dest: You can't treat people this way. Many of us have lost our homes. Our families!

String.Source: You need to sleep. The fatigue is wearing on you.
String.Dest: 你需要睡一觉。疲劳正在吞没你。

String.Source: It...it isn't fatigue. Jora said it was shock. After all that's happened, sometimes the words...they get caught in my throat.
String.Dest: It...it isn't fatigue. Jora said it was shock. After all that's happened, sometimes the words...they get caught in my throat.

String.Source: What about the Hall of the Dead?
String.Dest: 亡者之厅怎么样？

String.Source: I like the shrine. And I...I don't like sunsets. The sky flushes with color, and it...it reminds me of things.
String.Dest: I like the shrine. And I...I don't like sunsets. The sky flushes with color, and it...it reminds me of things.

String.Source: Slow down. What are you talking about?
String.Dest: 喘口气，慢慢说什么事？

String.Source: There were so many that night...so cold...I...I need some time alone. Forgive me.
String.Dest: There were so many that night...so cold...I...I need some time alone. Forgive me.

String.Source: Vampires are made of ashes and flesh. Yet it's the flesh part that is unnatural.
String.Dest: 吸血鬼由灰和血肉组成，血肉的部分也不是自然而成的。

String.Source: So...so that means he's dead. They're all dead. Even if they're alive.
String.Dest: So...so that means he's dead. They're all dead. Even if they're alive.

String.Source: Why so defensive? We haven't even met.
String.Dest: Why so defensive? We haven't even met.

String.Source: I'm sorry, I just want to be left alone.
String.Dest: 真对不起，我只是想一个人呆会儿。

String.Source: That's all I've got for now.
String.Dest: 我手头就有这些了。

String.Source: That was almost...fun. To think I had forgotten what it was like to smile. Thank you.
String.Dest: That was almost...fun. To think I had forgotten what it was like to smile. Thank you.

String.Source: I know what I think. I think your "friend" is too dangerous too let live.
String.Dest: 我知道我在想什么。我觉得你的“朋友”太危险以至于不能让他活着。

String.Source: I...I beg for your mercy.
String.Dest: 我……我求求你大发慈悲吧。

String.Source: It was foolish of them to expect so much. You couldn't corral a butterfly.
String.Dest: It was foolish of them to expect so much. You couldn't corral a butterfly.

String.Source: You're right. I'm not a leader.I'm weak. I...I wasn't strong enough to save him.
String.Dest: You're right. I'm not a leader.I'm weak. I...I wasn't strong enough to save him.

String.Source: Wouldn't it save time to eat a cooked meal?
String.Dest: 直接吃顿现成的饭岂不是更省时间么？

String.Source: I can't afford to. It...it has to be raw.
String.Dest: 我买不起。它...它必须得是生的。

String.Source: Relax. It was a jest.
String.Dest: 放轻松，只是开个玩笑。

String.Source: Oh. Please don't do that again.
String.Dest: Oh. Please don't do that again.

String.Source: Take it easy. I mean you no harm.
String.Dest: 放松，我是说你没受伤。

String.Source: Thank you. But if you have questions, I'm afraid I won't be of much help.
String.Dest: Thank you. But if you have questions, I'm afraid I won't be of much help.

String.Source: Dragonsreach. Where King Olaf baited the dragon Numinex, with a sweet roll.
String.Dest: 龙临堡. 听说就是奥拉夫国王诱捕恶龙怒米奈科斯的地方，用的诱饵是甜甜圈。

String.Source: A sweetroll? No...that's not true. I...I'm not that naive.
String.Dest: A sweetroll? No...that's not true. I...I'm not that naive.

String.Source: The Throat of the World. Where mortals can touch the stars...
String.Dest: 世界之喉，那是一个让凡人也可以摸到星星的地方...

String.Source: Really?
String.Dest: 真的吗？

String.Source: Morrowind is charming. But Skyrim lays claim to many wonders as well.
String.Dest: 晨风省是个风景优美的地方。但是天际省人认为他们的家乡同样拥有众多的奇观异景

String.Source: I know, but I cannot bear to see them alone. Perhaps...you would be willing to describe them for me?
String.Dest: I know, but I cannot bear to see them alone. Perhaps...you would be willing to describe them for me?

String.Source: Well, looks like you've found it.
String.Dest: 嗯...看起来你已经找到它了。

String.Source: I'm sorry. Please. I'm not a monster.
String.Dest: I'm sorry. Please. I'm not a monster.

String.Source: You seem to have found your voice. Now tell me what happened.
String.Dest: You seem to have found your voice. Now tell me what happened.

String.Source: I...I don't want to talk about it. Not to you.
String.Dest: I...I don't want to talk about it. Not to you.

String.Source: I think it's an improvement.
String.Dest: 我认为这是一个进步。

String.Source: You must be very strong to be so mean. I envy you.
String.Dest: You must be very strong to be so mean. I envy you.

String.Source: I just wanted to talk.
String.Dest: 我只是想谈谈。

String.Source: I know, but I don't know much about the city. I'm new here, like you.
String.Dest: I know, but I don't know much about the city. I'm new here, like you.

String.Source: Fine. Wallow in your lake of self-pity. In fact, I hope you drown in it.
String.Dest: Fine. Wallow in your lake of self-pity. In fact, I hope you drown in it.

String.Source: I wish I could. Fall into a river and drown. Be with Feldas, mother, and father again.
String.Dest: I wish I could. Fall into a river and drown. Be with Feldas, mother, and father again.

String.Source: Fine. Wallow in your lake of self-pity. In fact, I hope you drown in it.
String.Dest: Fine. Wallow in your lake of self-pity. In fact, I hope you drown in it.

String.Source: It was a lake...that's where the things lived. The lake is where Lortheim said they come from, before heading upriver to the docks to feed.
String.Dest: 这个湖...就是那些东西的老巢。罗瑟姆说的，在他们沿河往上游走到码头吃点心之前。

String.Source: Fine. Wallow in your lake of self-pity. In fact, I hope you drown in it.
String.Dest: Fine. Wallow in your lake of self-pity. In fact, I hope you drown in it.

String.Source: They...they live there. They still do. They come from the south, at the fork in the river. Near Mara's Eye.
String.Dest: They...they live there. They still do. They come from the south, at the fork in the river. Near Mara's Eye.

String.Source: How long have you lived in Windhelm?
String.Dest: 你在风盔城生活多久了？

String.Source: Not long. I haven't found a place yet since...since we left Morrowind. They have beds at Candlehearth Hall, but the people aren't very friendly.
String.Dest: Not long. I haven't found a place yet since...since we left Morrowind. They have beds at Candlehearth Hall, but the people aren't very friendly.

String.Source: How long have you lived in Windhelm?
String.Dest: 你在风盔城生活多久了？

String.Source: But Ambarys lets me stay at the Cornerclub. There aren't many beds. But...I don't sleep much anyway.
String.Dest: But Ambarys lets me stay at the Cornerclub. There aren't many beds. But...I don't sleep much anyway.

String.Source: Vampirism is not a curse. It's not a disease. It's a blessing.
String.Dest: 吸血鬼热不是诅咒也不是疾病，而是祝福。

String.Source: I cannot...I will not believe that such a thing could ever be an agent of good.
String.Dest: 我不能...我没法相信这样的东西会是善良的代表。

String.Source: Take your time. Breathe.
String.Dest: 抓紧时间，呼吸.

String.Source: Thank you. Feldas used to tell me the same, but for different reasons. I...I was always so angry with him.
String.Dest: Thank you. Feldas used to tell me the same, but for different reasons. I...I was always so angry with him.

String.Source: We? You seem to be alone.
String.Dest: 我们？你可是一个人。

String.Source: My family. They're...they're gone.
String.Dest: My family. They're...they're gone.

String.Source: What happened?
String.Dest: 发生什么事了？

String.Source: I'm sorry. It's just...it hurts to talk about it.
String.Dest: I'm sorry. It's just...it hurts to talk about it.

String.Source: Pink petals bloom under a shaft of moonlight, as waterfalls cascade around it.
String.Dest: 粉色的花瓣在一束月光下开放，旁边有着喷流的瀑布

String.Source: It sounds quite beautiful.
String.Dest: 这听起来很美。

String.Source: Oh yes you are. You're an evil monster. You should be punished.
String.Dest: Oh yes you are. You're an evil monster. You should be punished.

String.Source: No! I promise you I'm not...I'm not like the others. Sometimes I'm tempted but...but I'm not a bad person!
String.Dest: No! I promise you I'm not...I'm not like the others. Sometimes I'm tempted but...but I'm not a bad person!

String.Source: Oh yes you are. You're an evil monster. You should be punished.
String.Dest: Oh yes you are. You're an evil monster. You should be punished.

String.Source: I...I can answer your questions. Then you can judge for yourself.
String.Dest: 我…我可以回答你的问题。然后你就可以做出自己的判断。

String.Source: I don't know what happened, but blaming yourself isn't healthy.
String.Dest: 我不知道发生了什么，不过责怪你自己总是不健康的。

String.Source: No, it's all my fault. I...I was supposed to look after him. I was the mature one.
String.Dest: No, it's all my fault. I...I was supposed to look after him. I was the mature one.

String.Source: Yes, being a vampire is wrong. Very, very wrong. Which is why it must be fun.
String.Dest: 是啊，做一个吸血鬼是个错误，非常离谱的错误。所以一定超有乐子！

String.Source: No. I won't give in. But I will give up. I'm so tired of fighting it. I can only hope Feldas, mother, and father can hold out a little longer.
String.Dest: 不，我绝不屈服。但是我放弃了，我厌倦了争斗。我只能希望芬达斯，父母亲可以多坚持一段时间。

String.Source: You can see them when I end your miserable life.
String.Dest: 等你那悲惨的生命被我终结了之后，你就能与他们见面了。

String.Source: Then do it. I-I'm tired. So tired of fighting. I can only hope Feldas, mother, and father can hold out a little longer.
String.Dest: 那去做吧，我已经累了。战斗让我感到厌烦，我只期望芬达斯，妈妈还有爸爸能再多坚持一阵。

String.Source: Your brother was a monster who fed on the innocent. Mourn him not.
String.Dest: 你哥哥是一个吃人的怪物。别为他伤心了 。

String.Source: No...he was eager...so full of life...it wasn't his fault. It was mine.
String.Dest: 不...他对生命...多么渴望...都是我的错，我的错啊。

String.Source: Feldas is gone. He wanted to tell you he was sorry.
String.Dest: 菲尔达斯走了。他想告诉你他感到抱歉。

String.Source: Feldas? You spoke with him? Where is he? I want to see him!
String.Dest: 芬达斯？你跟他说话了？他在哪儿？我要见他！

String.Source: No, it isn't. But I'm afraid they're gone for good now.
String.Dest: 不，不是这样。但是我怕他们一去不复返了。

String.Source: Then it's too late. I prayed to Arkay for life, but now...I ask him for solace as I mourn.
String.Dest: 那看来太迟了。我曾向阿尔凯祈祷生命，可现在……我只能在哀恸中祈求一点安慰了。

String.Source: Yes, being a vampire is wrong. Very, very wrong. Which is why it must be fun.
String.Dest: 是啊，做一个吸血鬼是个错误，非常离谱的错误。所以一定超有乐子！

String.Source: Please...leave me be. I don't want any trouble.
String.Dest: Please...leave me be. I don't want any trouble.

String.Source: Yes, being a vampire is wrong. Very, very wrong. Which is why it must be fun.
String.Dest: 是啊，做一个吸血鬼是个错误，非常离谱的错误。所以一定超有乐子！

String.Source: Feldas, mother, father...we're dead, aren't we. All of us. Even me. But is it wrong to want to see them again?
String.Dest: 芬达斯，妈，爸...我们死了，是吧？全都死了，连我也是。可想要再见他们一面也是错吗？

String.Source: Your brother sounds foolhardy. Emphasis on the "fool" part.
String.Dest: Your brother sounds foolhardy. Emphasis on the "fool" part.

String.Source: He was still my brother. You have no right, but...it was not you...not you who killed him. It was me.
String.Dest: He was still my brother. You have no right, but...it was not you...not you who killed him. It was me.

String.Source: It was a big sweet roll. It was filled with members of the Blades.
String.Dest: It was a big sweet roll. It was filled with members of the Blades.

String.Source: Were they hiding, or just bait?
String.Dest: 他们躲起来了，或者只是圈套？

String.Source: Foolish boy. What happened next?
String.Dest: 傻孩子……然后发生了什么？

String.Source: Father chased after him. Mother and I...we followed. We passed Hollyfrost Farm just as Feldas started to cross the river.
String.Dest: 爸爸追赶着他。妈妈和我……紧随其后。当芬达斯开始过河时我们正好经过圣洁冰霜农场。

String.Source: Foolish boy. What happened next?
String.Dest: 傻孩子……然后发生了什么？

String.Source: He hopped on a large ice floe by the bank. I thought he'd slip. Mother hollered at Feldas to be careful. He just stamped his feet.
String.Dest: 他跳上一块大浮冰。我想他摔倒了。妈妈大叫着告诉芬达斯要小心. 他却只是干跺脚。

String.Source: Foolish boy. What happened next?
String.Dest: 傻孩子……然后发生了什么？

String.Source: Then...it all happened so fast. The floe...it didn't crack, it didn't even make a sound. It just came straight through the ice Like a ghost.
String.Dest: Then...it all happened so fast. The floe...it didn't crack, it didn't even make a sound. It just came straight through the ice Like a ghost.

String.Source: It's understandable, given how young and excitable he was.
String.Dest: 可以理解，当时他那么年轻又那么兴奋。

String.Source: Father chased after him. Mother and I...we followed. We passed Hollyfrost Farm just as Feldas started to cross the river.
String.Dest: 爸爸追赶着他。妈妈和我……紧随其后。当芬达斯开始过河时我们正好经过圣洁冰霜农场。

String.Source: It's understandable, given how young and excitable he was.
String.Dest: 可以理解，当时他那么年轻又那么兴奋。

String.Source: He hopped on a large ice floe by the bank. I thought he'd slip. Mother hollered at Feldas to be careful. He just stamped his feet.
String.Dest: 他跳上一块大浮冰。我想他摔倒了。妈妈大叫着告诉芬达斯要小心. 他却只是干跺脚。

String.Source: It's understandable, given how young and excitable he was.
String.Dest: 可以理解，当时他那么年轻又那么兴奋。

String.Source: Then...it all happened so fast. The floe...it didn't crack, it didn't even make a sound. It just came straight through the ice. Like a ghost.
String.Dest: Then...it all happened so fast. The floe...it didn't crack, it didn't even make a sound. It just came straight through the ice. Like a ghost.

String.Source: Tell me what happened the night you arrived in Windhelm.
String.Dest: 告诉我发生了什么事，晚上你来到风盔城.

String.Source: We had just crossed the border to Refugee's Rest. Father read the decree. Mother placed mountain flowers by the shallow grave markers.
String.Dest: We had just crossed the border to Refugee's Rest. Father read the decree. Mother placed mountain flowers by the shallow grave markers.

String.Source: Tell me what happened the night you arrived in Windhelm.
String.Dest: 告诉我发生了什么事，晚上你来到风盔城.

String.Source: Only Feldas didn't care about graves and monuments...it was already an hour past midnight...he shouldn't have gone on ahead.
String.Dest: Only Feldas didn't care about graves and monuments...it was already an hour past midnight...he shouldn't have gone on ahead.

String.Source: Tell me what happened the night you arrived in Windhelm.
String.Dest: 告诉我发生了什么事，晚上你来到风盔城.

String.Source: He was so excited...we heard him calling through the darkness.
String.Dest: 他当时很激动……我们能听见他在黑暗中呼喊。

String.Source: Tell me what happened the night you arrived in Windhelm.
String.Dest: 告诉我发生了什么事，晚上你来到风盔城.

String.Source: He could see the lights from the dock, and if you squinted, you could almost see the outline of the palace.
String.Dest: He could see the lights from the dock, and if you squinted, you could almost see the outline of the palace.

String.Source: Tell me what happened the night you arrived in Windhelm.
String.Dest: 告诉我发生了什么事，晚上你来到风盔城.

String.Source: What did? What came through the ice?
String.Dest: 那是什么？什么穿过了冰？

String.Source: It was...it was a hand.
String.Dest: 这是……这是只手。

String.Source: Tell me what happened the night you arrived in Windhelm.
String.Dest: 告诉我发生了什么事，晚上你来到风盔城.

String.Source: What did? What came through the ice?
String.Dest: 那是什么？什么穿过了冰？

String.Source: When Feldas hit the floor, the ice broke. He...he fell in, and father went in after. Mother was screaming, and I...I just froze.
String.Dest: When Feldas hit the floor, the ice broke. He...he fell in, and father went in after. Mother was screaming, and I...I just froze.

String.Source: Tell me what happened the night you arrived in Windhelm.
String.Dest: 告诉我发生了什么事，晚上你来到风盔城.

String.Source: What did? What came through the ice?
String.Dest: 那是什么？什么穿过了冰？

String.Source: We were standing on the embankment, when...more of them...they came right out of the snow.
String.Dest: We were standing on the embankment, when...more of them...they came right out of the snow.

String.Source: Tell me what happened the night you arrived in Windhelm.
String.Dest: 告诉我发生了什么事，晚上你来到风盔城.

String.Source: What did? What came through the ice?
String.Dest: 那是什么？什么穿过了冰？

String.Source: I felt a hand...it was cold...so cold...and I fainted. They say my blood turned hot as fire...but all I remember was the frigidness of that hand.
String.Dest: I felt a hand...it was cold...so cold...and I fainted. They say my blood turned hot as fire...but all I remember was the frigidness of that hand.

String.Source: Tell me what happened the night you arrived in Windhelm.
String.Dest: 告诉我发生了什么事，晚上你来到风盔城.

String.Source: What happened?
String.Dest: 发生什么事了？

String.Source: I woke up inside the temple. Jora was whispering a prayer. I felt so strange...so weak.
String.Dest: I woke up inside the temple. Jora was whispering a prayer. I felt so strange...so weak.

String.Source: Tell me what happened the night you arrived in Windhelm.
String.Dest: 告诉我发生了什么事，晚上你来到风盔城.

String.Source: What happened?
String.Dest: 发生什么事了？

String.Source: Lortheim said a Nord named Brunwulf saved me, when the guards did nothing. By himself, I was the only one he could save.
String.Dest: 罗瑟姆说是有个叫布伦武夫的诺德人救了我，当时连卫兵都没有出手。凭一己之力，他也只能救我一个。

String.Source: Tell me what happened the night you arrived in Windhelm.
String.Dest: 告诉我发生了什么事，晚上你来到风盔城.

String.Source: What happened?
String.Dest: 发生什么事了？

String.Source: The priest put a cold towel to my brow, and I looked up at the great statue of Talos. It almost felt like...like he was sneering at me.
String.Dest: The priest put a cold towel to my brow, and I looked up at the great statue of Talos. It almost felt like...like he was sneering at me.

String.Source: Tell me what happened the night you arrived in Windhelm.
String.Dest: 告诉我发生了什么事，晚上你来到风盔城.

String.Source: What happened?
String.Dest: 发生什么事了？

String.Source: He was telling me it was my fault. My burden. I...I'm sorry. I don't want to talk about this anymore.
String.Dest: He was telling me it was my fault. My burden. I...I'm sorry. I don't want to talk about this anymore.

String.Source: Well, the city it rivals is Seyda Neen. As in both are forgettable.
String.Dest: 这城市的对头是西达尼恩. 对于两方来说都这件事很难记住.

String.Source: But Seyda Neen is the swamp fever capital of the world. That is not something you can easily forget.
String.Dest: 但西达尼恩是世界上的疟疾之都。这不是你可以轻易忘记的事。

String.Source: Who was Feldas?
String.Dest: 菲尔达斯是何方神圣？?

String.Source: He was my brother. My fraternal twin. But the only thing we shared was our birthday.
String.Dest: He was my brother. My fraternal twin. But the only thing we shared was our birthday.

String.Source: Who was Feldas?
String.Dest: 菲尔达斯是何方神圣？?

String.Source: He was brash. He never listened. When we were children, he'd use illusion spells to steal sweets from the cupboard.
String.Dest: He was brash. He never listened. When we were children, he'd use illusion spells to steal sweets from the cupboard.

String.Source: Who was Feldas?
String.Dest: 菲尔达斯是何方神圣？?

String.Source: When the elders forbade destruction magic, he would rush me to the neighbor's yard and set fire to the chickens.
String.Dest: When the elders forbade destruction magic, he would rush me to the neighbor's yard and set fire to the chickens.

String.Source: Who was Feldas?
String.Dest: 菲尔达斯是何方神圣？?

String.Source: The elders blamed me. I was the responsible one. They said I was supposed to stop him. That it was my fault. They...they were right.
String.Dest: The elders blamed me. I was the responsible one. They said I was supposed to stop him. That it was my fault. They...they were right.

String.Source: To be honest, I haven't traveled much, or seen many landmarks.
String.Dest: 老实说，我也没旅行过多远，或者说，我去过的地方还很少。

String.Source: Oh. Well, if at some point you do, I'd love it if you came back and shared your experiences.
String.Dest: Oh. Well, if at some point you do, I'd love it if you came back and shared your experiences.

String.Source: The Eldergleam Sanctuary. A grove that rivals any city.
String.Dest: 古藤圣所。媲美任何一座城市的小树林。

String.Source: Ah, I'd like to hear more.
String.Dest: 啊，我想听更多。

String.Source: All right, then.
String.Dest: 那就这样吧。

String.Source: Farewell.
String.Dest: 再会。

String.Source: Goodbye.
String.Dest: 再见。

String.Source: Greetings.
String.Dest: 你好。

String.Source: Well met.
String.Dest: 幸会。

String.Source: Yes?
String.Dest: 什么？

String.Source: What is it?
String.Dest: 什么？

String.Source: Hm?
String.Dest: 嗯？

String.Source: I asked Falion to have the body sent back to Cyrodiil. He should be home.
String.Dest: 我让法利昂把尸体送回了赛瑞迪尔。他应该落叶归根了。

String.Source: I-I appreciate all you've done for me.
String.Dest: 谢……谢谢你为我做的一切。

String.Source: I hope mother and father are okay. But I don't know if it's worth the consequences.
String.Dest: 我希望父母没事。但我并不知道究竟怎么样。

String.Source: Feldas. I'm glad he's found peace.
String.Dest: 芬达斯。我很高兴他寻到了安宁。
